mean_cn: n. 伴随的结果（有用的副产品，派生）
mean_en: a book, a film/ movie, a television programme, or an object that is based on a book, film/ movie or television series that has been very successful
sentence: There are many spinoffs from the original TV series 'Journey to the West'.
sentence_trans: 老版电视剧“西游记”有许多的衍生剧。
